recipe_name: Green bean, red pepper and brazil nut salad
author: Garrey Dawson
method: Place the green beans into a steamer and steam for 4-5 minutes, until tender. Transfer to a bowl, add the rest of the salad ingredients and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Stir well to combine.  Spoon into a serving bowl and serve.
ingredients: 75g/2Â½oz green beans, topped and tailed ,  1 red pepper, sliced,  2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  2 tsp sesame seeds, toasted,  30g/1oz brazil nuts, chopped,  4 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
